progetto.network

Class ServerStateTransferEnforce

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.network.ServerStateTransferEnforce
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IEnforce

    final class ServerStateTransferEnforce
extends java.lang.Object
implements IEnforce
    This enforce is sent to the client when the server wishes to notify that the server state is changed. Server state updates are not provided by default and must be requested by the client.
    Author:
    Massimo
